title: Death & Doris: Escape Terminal Episode 1
description: A terminally-ill teenager finds more than a simple escape when he agrees to take part in a futuristic medical experiment involving virtual reality gaming. Everett 'Death' Hall discovers a new life where he isn't trapped by his failing body.  Join Everett and friends as they level up, battle vicious foes, and deal with the most dangerous creatures in New Terminal: other players.   A Western LITRPG novella series releasing monthly.  Welcome to Escape Terminal: It may be an escape, but it's definitely not a paradise.
author: Eddie J. Green
